Regarding thunks, I have a frule with various ways to compute the return value. Some of them are expensive (eigen-decomposing a matrix), some of them are just returning a zero-ed array.
Is the general guideline to `@thunk` the whole conditional, to thunk the last bits computing the final y, Delta_y (which means thunking trivial things)?
